title: Vflow — Logistics Cloud Platform
summary: Built a cloud-native logistics platform to unify planning and real-time tracking; reduced delays by 28% and achieved 99.98% uptime.

title: Aurapay — PCI-Compliant Payments Core
summary: Architected a PCI-compliant, tokenized payments core with event-driven processing; supported $20M+/month, zero incidents, and 40% faster deployments.

title: IndoIrish news — Irish Digital Newspaper Platform
summary: Developed a scalable, high-performance digital news publishing system for an Irish media network. Delivered instant content publishing, user personalization, and subscription-based access.

title: Shopee — Local Grocery Delivery App (Ireland)
summary: Launched a location-based grocery ordering and delivery platform connecting Irish local stores to customers. Implemented route optimization, real-time order tracking, and digital payments.
